snippet.title: space quest 1 (VGA version) 1991
snippet.description:
Space Quest 1 "The Sarien encounter". An adventure game / role playing game. You are Roger Wilco and you have to save the world. This is a goodie from my MS-DOS collection. The game dates from 1991. In this video I replay the first 15 min of the game. Then I finish with some game settings to play in DosBox and how I recorded this video. Enjoy the classic midi tunes... sounds still great!
Game directions
http://sierrahelp.com/Games/SpaceQuest/SQ1VGAHelp.html
Here you find a user manual / codelist published by Sierra the game developer. Also a walkthrough and information like sound samples and funny scenes.
